name: Powergrid (Absurd Walls)
description:
Powergrid is a short puzzle game I made for Global Game Jam 2023. The theme was 'roots'. You must power each circuit from a root to the goal.

Sounds Used:

(all sounds were gathered from freesound.org)

"voxy-synth-pop" by ani_music 

"success" by sjonas88

"gasp_ui_reject" by rob marion
